page.title: 20A Middle School Afternoon
page.content: After morning lessons we have dinner time. Some people have school dinners and the rest bring sandwiches. The children who have school dinners go into the dining room, where hot-dogs, chips, beans, hamburgers and so on are served. In the summer when it is dry the children who have sandwiches are allowed to eat them outside, otherwise they use the dining room when the others have finished. Health Education is the first lesson in the afternoon. We have been learning about teeth and hands. Recently we have done a project on a famous person in medicine. French is next. In this we are learning to describe our room and the things in it. After a 10 minute break we have Humanities. In this we are learning about the Vikings and their lives. At 3.30p.m. we go home.
